Pinyin1: nǎge jǐngdiǎn zuì yǒumíng ？
Chinese1: 哪个景点最有名？
Translate1: Which sightseeing spot is the most famous?

Pinyin1: zài zhèlǐ bǐjiào piányi ma ？
Chinese1: 在这里比较便宜吗？
Translate1: Is it cheaper here?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ de jiāotōng fāngbiàn ma ？
Chinese1: 这里的交通方便吗？
Translate1: Is the transportation here convenient?

Pinyin1: xiǎngyào mǎi lǐwù zěnmebàn ？
Chinese1: 想要买礼物怎么办？
Translate1: What can I do if I want to buy a gift?

Pinyin1: néng tuījiàn yīxiē tèsè kāfēiguǎn ma ？
Chinese1: 能推荐一些特色咖啡馆吗？
Translate1: Can you recommend some special cafes?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīnggāi cóng nǎlǐ kāishǐ lǚxíng ？
Chinese1: 我们应该从哪里开始旅行？
Translate1: Where should we start our journey?

Pinyin1: nǎlǐ yǒu ānquán de zhùchù ？
Chinese1: 哪里有安全的住处？
Translate1: Where is a safe accommodation?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu shénme yǒuqù de jiànyì ？
Chinese1: 你有什么有趣的建议？
Translate1: Do you have any interesting suggestions?

Pinyin1: fùjìn yǒu miǎnfèi yóulǎn jǐngdiǎn ma ？
Chinese1: 附近有免费游览景点吗？
Translate1: Are there any free attractions nearby?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ de yèjǐng zěnmeyàng ？
Chinese1: 这里的夜景怎么样？
Translate1: How is the night view here?

Pinyin1: wǒ kěyǐ jiè nǐ de lǚxíng zhǐnán me ？
Chinese1: 我可以借你的旅行指南么？
Translate1: Can I borrow your travel guide?

Pinyin1: wǒ kěyǐ gòumǎi dāngdì tèsè shāngpǐn ma ？
Chinese1: 我可以购买当地特色商品吗？
Translate1: Can I buy local special products?

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ cānjiā shénme huódòng ？
Chinese1: 我们可以参加什么活动？
Translate1: What kind of activities can we participate in?

Pinyin1: wǒ hé péngyou kěyǐ qù nǎlǐ wán ？
Chinese1: 我和朋友可以去哪里玩？
Translate1: Where can me and my friends go to have fun?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ huì yǒu hěnduō rén ma ？
Chinese1: 这里会有很多人吗？
Translate1: Will there be a lot of people here?

Pinyin1: yǒu shénme jìniànpǐn kěyǐ dàihuíjiā ？
Chinese1: 有什么纪念品可以带回家？
Translate1: Are there any souvenirs to bring home?

Pinyin1: nǐ huì shuō hànyǔ ma ？
Chinese1: 你会说汉语吗？
Translate1: Do you speak Chinese?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu shíjiān yīqǐ qù lǚyóu ma ？
Chinese1: 你有时间一起去旅游吗？
Translate1: Do you have time to go travelling together?

Pinyin1: nǐ juéde bǐsàxiétǎ yǒuqù ma ？
Chinese1: 你觉得比萨斜塔有趣吗？
Translate1: Do you find the Piza Leaning Tower interesting?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng chángshì yìdàlì liàolǐ ma ？
Chinese1: 你想尝试意大利料理吗？
Translate1: Would you like to try Italian food?

Pinyin1: nǐ dǎsuàn zuòfēijī qù rìběn ma ？
Chinese1: 你打算坐飞机去日本吗？
Translate1: Are you planning to go to Japan by plane?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng zài hǎibiān dùjià ma ？
Chinese1: 你想在海边度假吗？
Translate1: Do you want to have a vacation by the sea?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng chénghuǒchē qù tàiguó ma ？
Chinese1: 你想乘火车去泰国吗？
Translate1: Would you like to go to Thailand by train?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu xìngqù cānguān bāěr mǎ dàqiáo ma ？
Chinese1: 你有兴趣参观巴尔马大桥吗？
Translate1: Are you interested in visiting the Barmah Bridge?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng kàn yībù tàiguó gējù ma ？
Chinese1: 你想看一部泰国歌剧吗？
Translate1: Would you like to see a Thai Opera?

Pinyin1: zǎoqǐ kàn rìchū ， hěnpiāoliàng ！
Chinese1: 早起看日出，很漂亮！
Translate1: Rise early and watch the sunrise, it's so beautiful!

Pinyin1: qù cānguān sìmiào ma ？
Chinese1: 去参观寺庙吗？
Translate1: Shall we visit the temple?

Pinyin1: wǒ nìngyuàn qù hǎitān yuǎnzú 。
Chinese1: 我宁愿去海滩远足。
Translate1: I'd rather go on a beach hike.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ qù qiánshuǐ ？
Chinese1: 我们可以去潜水？
Translate1: Can we go for diving?

Pinyin1: yīqǐ chūqù yěcān bā ！
Chinese1: 一起出去野餐吧！
Translate1: Let's go for a picnic together！

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng qù nǎlǐ dēngshān ？
Chinese1: 你想去哪里登山？
Translate1: Where do you want to go for a mountain climb?

Pinyin1: wǒ xiǎng mǎi yīxiē dāngdì tèsè jìniànpǐn 。
Chinese1: 我想买一些当地特色纪念品。
Translate1: I'd like to buy some souvenirs of local characteristics.

Pinyin1: nǐ jīntiān yào qù nǎzhǒng jǐngdiǎn ？
Chinese1: 你今天要去哪种景点？
Translate1: What kind of scenery will you visit today?

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ dào shānshàng yuǎnzú ？
Chinese1: 我们可以到山上远足？
Translate1: Can we go for a hike on the mountain?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng qù nǎlǐ lǚxíng ？
Chinese1: 你想去哪里旅行？
Translate1: Where do you want to travel?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ yǒuméiyǒu hàochī de ？
Chinese1: 这里有没有好吃的？
Translate1: Is there anything good to eat here?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu nǎxiē jǐngdiǎn ？
Chinese1: 你有哪些景点？
Translate1: What sights do you have here?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ yǒu shénme hǎo wán de dōngxi ？
Chinese1: 这里有什么好玩的东西？
Translate1: What can I do for fun around here?

Pinyin1: yǒuméiyǒu yóuwán de huódòng ？
Chinese1: 有没有游玩的活动？
Translate1: Are there any attractions to explore?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ de cānguǎn dōu shì nǎlǐ de měishí ？
Chinese1: 这里的餐馆都是哪里的美食？
Translate1: What cuisine do the restaurants here serve?

Pinyin1: nǐ jiànyì wǒ qù nǎge dìfāng ？
Chinese1: 你建议我去哪个地方？
Translate1: What places would you suggest I go to?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ yǒuméiyǒu lìshǐ yóulǎn de dìfāng ？
Chinese1: 这里有没有历史游览的地方？
Translate1: Are there any historical tours around here?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ de jǐngdiǎn yǒu nǎxiē ？
Chinese1: 这里的景点有哪些？
Translate1: What are the attractions around here?

Pinyin1: yǒuméiyǒu yóuyǒngchí kěyǐ yóuyǒng ？
Chinese1: 有没有游泳池可以游泳？
Translate1: Are there any swimming pools to swim in?

Pinyin1: yǒu duōshǎo shāngdiàn kěyǐ guàng ？
Chinese1: 有多少商店可以逛？
Translate1: How many shops are there to explore?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu nǎxiē lǚyóu lùxiàn gěi wǒ cānkǎo ？
Chinese1: 你有哪些旅游路线给我参考？
Translate1: What travel itineraries do you have for me to reference?

Pinyin1: yǒu shénme xīn de dìfāng nǐ jiànyì wǒ qù ？
Chinese1: 有什么新的地方你建议我去？
Translate1: What new places would you suggest I visit?

Pinyin1: yǒuméiyǒu chuántǒng huódòng kěyǐ cānjiā ？
Chinese1: 有没有传统活动可以参加？
Translate1: Are there any traditional activities to participate in?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ yǒu shénme zìránfēngjǐng kěyǐ kàn ？
Chinese1: 这里有什么自然风景可以看？
Translate1: What natural scenery can I see here?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ yǒu shénme zuì shòuhuānyíng de jǐngdiǎn ？
Chinese1: 这里有什么最受欢迎的景点？
Translate1: What are the most popular attractions around here?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒuméiyǒu yīxiē hǎo de cāntīng tuījiàn ？
Chinese1: 你有没有一些好的餐厅推荐？
Translate1: Do you have any good restaurants to recommend?

Pinyin1: yǒuméiyǒu xīn de jǐngdiǎn kěyǐ qù ？
Chinese1: 有没有新的景点可以去？
Translate1: Are there any new attractions to visit?

Pinyin1: nǐ jiànyì wǒ qù cānguān xiē shénme ？
Chinese1: 你建议我去参观些什么？
Translate1: What places would you suggest I visit?

Pinyin1: yǒu shénme zhíde gòumǎi de ？
Chinese1: 有什么值得购买的？
Translate1: What's worth buying?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ kěyǐ zū yīliàng zìxíngchē ma ？
Chinese1: 这里可以租一辆自行车吗？
Translate1: Can I rent a bicycle here?

Pinyin1: qù fùjìn de hǎitān zěnme zǒu ？
Chinese1: 去附近的海滩怎么走？
Translate1: How do I get to the nearby beach?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ wǒ kěyǐ cānjiā shénme huódòng ？
Chinese1: 这里我可以参加什么活动？
Translate1: What activities can I do here?

Pinyin1: yǒu nǎxiē miǎnfèi jǐngdiǎn kěyǐ cānguān ？
Chinese1: 有哪些免费景点可以参观？
Translate1: What free attractions can I visit?

Pinyin1: yǒu shénme tǐyàn běndì tèsè de fāngshì ？
Chinese1: 有什么体验本地特色的方式？
Translate1: What are some ways to experience the local culture?

Pinyin1: yǒu shénme yúlèhuódòng kěyǐ cānjiā ？
Chinese1: 有什么娱乐活动可以参加？
Translate1: What recreational activities are available?

Pinyin1: yǒu nǎxiē gǔlǎo de jiànzhù kěyǐ cānguān ？
Chinese1: 有哪些古老的建筑可以参观？
Translate1: What old buildings can I visit?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ yǒu shénme gòuwùzhōngxīn kěyǐ guàng ？
Chinese1: 这里有什么购物中心可以逛？
Translate1: What shopping malls can I visit here?

Pinyin1: dāngdì yǒu shénme měishí kěyǐ pǐncháng ？
Chinese1: 当地有什么美食可以品尝？
Translate1: What local food can I try?

Pinyin1: yǒu shénme wēnquán kěyǐ yóuyǒng ？
Chinese1: 有什么温泉可以游泳？
Translate1: Are there any hot springs to swim in?

Pinyin1: yǒu shénme yùndòng xiàngmù kěyǐ chángshì ？
Chinese1: 有什么运动项目可以尝试？
Translate1: What sports activities can I try?

Pinyin1: zài zhōubiān yǒu shénme xīnjiàn de jiànzhù ？
Chinese1: 在周边有什么新建的建筑？
Translate1: What newly built buildings are there around here?

Pinyin1: yǒu shénme tǐyàn běndì jiérì de fāngshì ？
Chinese1: 有什么体验本地节日的方式？
Translate1: What are some ways to experience local festivals?

Pinyin1: rúguǒ kěyǐ ， wǒ yuànyì duō dāi jǐtiān ，
Chinese1: 如果可以，我愿意多呆几天，
Translate1: If possible, I would love to stay a few more days.

Pinyin1: wǒmen gāiwǎng nǎr qù ？
Chinese1: 我们该往哪儿去？
Translate1: Where shall we go?

Pinyin1: jīntiān wǒmen kěyǐ qù nǎlǐ lǚxíng ？
Chinese1: 今天我们可以去哪里旅行？
Translate1: Where can we go sightseeing today?

Pinyin1: wǒ xiǎng qù kànkan hǎitān 。
Chinese1: 我想去看看海滩。
Translate1: The beach is what I want to visit.

Pinyin1: nǐ zuò shénme jiāotōnggōngjù dào zhèlǐ ？
Chinese1: 你坐什么交通工具到这里？
Translate1: What mode of transport did you take to get here?

Pinyin1: wǒnéng mǎi dào hǎo jīpiào ma ？
Chinese1: 我能买到好机票吗？
Translate1: Can I get a good flight ticket?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu tíqián yùdìng lǚguǎn ma ？
Chinese1: 你有提前预定旅馆吗？
Translate1: Do you have a hotel reservation?

Pinyin1: wǒmen néng cānguān shénme ？
Chinese1: 我们能参观什么？
Translate1: What can we visit?

Pinyin1: zhèshì shénme jǐngguān ？
Chinese1: 这是什么景观？
Translate1: What is the scenery here?

Pinyin1: nǐ dài le duōshǎo xíngli ？
Chinese1: 你带了多少行李？
Translate1: How much luggage have you brought?

Pinyin1: lǚyóu lǚxíng zhīchū yǒu duōshǎo ？
Chinese1: 旅游旅行支出有多少？
Translate1: How much do you spend on your trips?

Pinyin1: nǐ jīntiān de xíngchéng shì shénme ？
Chinese1: 你今天的行程是什么？
Translate1: What’s your itinerary today?

Pinyin1: nǐ zhīdào jīntiān wǎnshàng néng cānguān shénme ma ？
Chinese1: 你知道今天晚上能参观什么吗？
Translate1: Do you know what we can visit tonight?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ yǒu shāndòng huò dòngxué ma ？
Chinese1: 这里有山洞或洞穴吗？
Translate1: Is this a cave or cave?

Pinyin1: nǐmen jìhuà zài zhèlǐ tíngliú duōjiǔ ？
Chinese1: 你们计划在这里停留多久？
Translate1: How long do you plan to stay here?

Pinyin1: wǒmen qù nǎlǐ cānguān fēngjǐng ？
Chinese1: 我们去哪里参观风景？
Translate1: Where can we go for sightseeing?

Pinyin1: wǒ jiūjìng gāicháo nǎge fāngxiàng zǒu ？
Chinese1: 我究竟该朝哪个方向走？
Translate1: Which way should I go?

Pinyin1: nǐ shuō nàli de shātān rúhé ？
Chinese1: 你说那里的沙滩如何？
Translate1: How's the beach there?

Pinyin1: wǒmen qù nàli néng kàndào shénme ？
Chinese1: 我们去那里能看到什么？
Translate1: What can we see there?

Pinyin1: wǒ zhècì lǚxíng yǒu duōchángshíjiān ？
Chinese1: 我这次旅行有多长时间？
Translate1: How long is my trip?

Pinyin1: nǐ jièyì wǒ dàishàng yīwèi péngyou ma ？
Chinese1: 你介意我带上一位朋友吗？
Translate1: Do you mind me bringing a friend along?

Pinyin1: nín yǒu shénme lǚyóu jiànyì ？
Chinese1: 您有什么旅游建议？
Translate1: Do you have any travel advice?

Pinyin1: gòuwù diàn zhōuwéi yǒu shénme hǎo chī de ？
Chinese1: 购物店周围有什么好吃的？
Translate1: What’s good to eat around the shopping mall?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu shénme yǒuqù de zhàopiàn yào fēnxiǎng ma ？
Chinese1: 你有什么有趣的照片要分享吗？
Translate1: Do you have any interesting photos to share?

Pinyin1: nǐ de péngyou dōu qù nǎ lǚxíng le ？
Chinese1: 你的朋友都去哪旅行了？
Translate1: Where have your friends traveled?

Pinyin1: nǐ zuì xǐhuan qù nǎlǐ lǚxíng ？
Chinese1: 你最喜欢去哪里旅行？
Translate1: Where is your favorite place to travel?

Pinyin1: nàli yǒu shénme gùshi ？
Chinese1: 那里有什么故事？
Translate1: What stories were you told there?

Pinyin1: zuìjìn qù lǚxíng shí ， nǐ xuédào le shénme ？
Chinese1: 最近去旅行时，你学到了什么？
Translate1: What did you learn on your last trip?

Pinyin1: nǐ jìhuà yào qù nǎr lǚxíng ？
Chinese1: 你计划要去哪儿旅行？
Translate1: Where are you planning to travel?

Pinyin1: nǐ rènwéi shéi de jiànyì zuìhǎo ？
Chinese1: 你认为谁的建议最好？
Translate1: Who do you think has the best travel advice?

Pinyin1: nǐ zuì xǐhuan de lǚxíng huódòng shì shénme ？
Chinese1: 你最喜欢的旅行活动是什么？
Translate1: What is your favorite travel activity?
